title: King Wa Nakayoku Naritakunai
alternative_title: 王は仲良くなりたくない ; The King Doesn't Want to Get Along
status: 王は仲良くなりたくない ; The King Doesn't Want to Get Along
description:
Description :
        “On the contrary, I'm curious about my seniors" Shifuji Shido, who is good-looking and literary and martial arts, is a "king of the school" that is recognized by both himself and others. When I looked at the popular junior, Atsouto Okawa, for some reason he liked it――!? I'm swayed by younger handsome guys!
